page.title: 06POPULATION SURVEY ABERDYFI
page.content:
On Sunday 2nd June 1985 between 11a.m. and noon one hundred adults were interviewed by primary school children using the semi structured interview technique. Of those interviewed 18 were{ {residents}of Aberdyfi:
{ BIRTHPLACE NUMBER
Aberdyfi 4 Wales(but not Aberdyfi) 3 Outside Wales 11
Three had retired to the village.Of the remainder,all employed,8 had moved to Aberdyfi from outside Wales to find employment in and around the village. {OCCUPATIONS: shopkeeper,secretary,hairdresser, waiter,council worker,fisherman, heating engineer,guesthouse owner.
